import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import CVJobsPortal from '../components/services/CVJobsPortal'; import { FaChartLine, FaBriefcase, FaUserGraduate } from 'react-icons/fa'; import useTheme from '../hooks/useTheme'; const CVJobsPortalPage = () => { const { isDarkMode } = useTheme(); const pageInfo = { title: 'CV & Jobs Portal', description: 'Submit your CV, track job applications, and access valuable employability resources. Our dedicated team will help connect you with the right opportunities to advance your career.' }; const stats = [ { value: '85%', label: 'Success Rate', description: 'Of our students find employment within 6 months of graduation', icon: , emoji: 'üìà' }, { value: '500+', label: 'Job Opportunities', description: 'Available through our network of trusted employers and partners', icon: , emoji: 'üíº' }, { value: '1000+', label: 'Students Placed', description: 'In their dream jobs across various industries and sectors', icon: , emoji: 'üéì' } ]; // Animation variants const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2, delayChildren: 0.1 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.6 } } }; return ( {/* Hero Section */}
